title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The AI Discussion Control Plane: How Your Agentic Team Redefines Ops (AIM418)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI讨论控制平面：您的智能体团队如何重新定义运维 (AIM418)
abstract: Dashboards and alerts are outdated. The future is autonomous AI teammates, each fluent with expertise in a different role, working together to solve problems and self heal. In this session, we’ll introduce Discussion Control Plane: an environment where specialized AI agents collaborate through structured debate and MCP to interpret code, understand deployments, view logs, correlate metrics, trace distributed requests, and analyze security events. By partnering as real teammates, these agents surface richer context, resolve conflicts, and orchestrate actionable responses. Attendees will learn how this shift creates not just faster detection and resolution, but a way for the human-in-the-loop to uplevel. This presentation is brought to you by Edge Delta, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 仪表板和警报已经过时。未来是自主AI队友，每个都精通不同角色的专业知识，协同工作解决问题并自我修复。在本次会议中，我们将介绍讨论控制平面：一个专业化AI代理通过结构化辩论和MCP协作的环境，用于解释代码、理解部署、查看日志、关联指标、跟踪分布式请求和分析安全事件。通过作为真正的队友合作，这些代理提供更丰富的上下文，解决冲突，并编排可操作的响应。与会者将了解这种转变不仅创造了更快的检测和解决方案，还为人在回路中的提升提供了途径。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Edge Delta提供。
